column4: hi, i want do this work: http://www.dd-wrt.com/wiki/images/9/9b/Repeater_Bridge.jpg can i join these two router with wire? or must be join with wireless wave?
this isnt really the channel for flashing routers
but to flash a routers firmware, you need to connect the router to a computer, not router to router
and by the way, be careful if your going to attempt to flash a router with someone elses firmware.. if you mess it up..  you'll brick the router
